title: The penitent pilgrim bemoning his sinfull condition. Faith appeares vnto him affording him comfort hope seconds that comfort charity promiseth him in this vaile of missery to cover all his scarlett sins wth: [sic] ye white robe of mercy, & conduct him safly to ye kingdome of glory. By Io: Hall
author: Brathwaite, Richard, 1588?-1673, attributed name.
notes: A Catholic work, variously attributed to Richard Brathwait (Wing), John Hall (1651 t.p.), and Henry Herdson (1652 t.p.).
A reissue of the 1641 edition, with engraved and letterpress title pages cancelled.
Cancel title page is engraved, signed "C: le Blon f:".
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
